Catat Tanggalnya, Harbolnas Kembali Digelar 11-12 Desember 2019
07 Nov 2019, 06:22 by Fajar Pebrianto, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Hari Belanja Online (Harbolnas) kembali digelar pada 11-12 Desember 2019 mendatang. Dalam perhelatan yang kesembilan kalinya ini, sektor perdagangan digital yang terlibat akan semakin diperluas.
“Tak hanya produk gaya hidup atau produk elektronik saja, tapi kami ingin semua bisa dipasarkan secara luas dan mudah melalui digital,” kata Ketua Umum Asosiasi E-Commerce Indonesia (IdEA) Ignatius Untung dari pihak penyelenggara Harbolnas, dalam konferensi pers di Jakarta, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Menurut Untung, pihaknya berharap perluasan ini bisa menyasar berbagai bidang, termasuk hasil alam. “Kami berharap platform yang memasarkan hasil alam juga bisa bergabung dengan Harbolnas kali ini,” kata dia.
Sebab, kata Untung, IdEA sangat menaruh perhatian besar untuk bisa mengembangkan jangkauan pasar dari produk hasil alam ini. “Yang paling efektif dan efisien tentu saja melalui pemasaran digital,” ujarnya.
Tahun ini, sebanyak 170 platform e-commerce telah mendaftarkan diri untuk ikut dalam ajang Harbolnas 12-12. Bagi IdEA, ajang Harbolnas kesembilan ini harus mempertimbangkan salah satu faktor penting yaitu kepercayaan konsumen terhadap 170 platform ini. “Dan tentu bagi peserta juga,” kata dia.
Pesta diskon belanja online ini sengaja diadakan dua hari. Hari pertama, 11 Desember 2019, fokus menjual produk lokal. Lalu hari kedua, 12 Desember 2019, untuk produk campuran, baik lokal maupun yang dari luar negeri. Konsep ini juga diterapkan pada ajang Harbolnas 2018 lalu.

Note the Date, Harbolnas is Held Again on 11-12 December 2019
Nov 7 2019, 06:22 by Fajar Pebrianto, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Online Shopping Day (Harbolnas) will be held again on 11-12 December 2019. In this ninth event, the digital trading sector involved will be increasingly expanded.
"It's not just lifestyle products or electronic products, but we want everything to be widely and easily marketed via digital," General Chairperson of the Indonesian E-Commerce Association (IdEA) Ignatius Untung from the organizer of Harbolnas, told a press conference in Jakarta on Thursday November 7, 2019.
According to Untung, he hoped that this expansion could target various fields, including natural products. "We hope that platforms that market natural products can also join Harbolnas this time," he said.
Because, said Untung, IdEA is very concerned to be able to develop the market reach of these natural products. "The most effective and efficient way is of course through digital marketing," he said.
This year, as many as 170 e-commerce platforms have registered to take part in the 12-12 Harbolnas. For IdEA, the ninth Harbolnas must consider one important factor, namely consumer confidence in these 170 platforms. "And of course for participants too," he said.
Online shopping discount party is deliberately held two days. The first day, 11 December 2019, focused on selling local products. Then the second day, December 12, 2019, for mixed products, both local and foreign. This concept was also applied at the 2018 Harbolnas.
